import Typography from "@material-ui/core/Typography"; import Box from "@material-ui/core/Box"; export default function Intro() { return ( TurboVax finds the latest vaccine appointments from 37 city/state administration sites in NYC. There are two ways that you can use our tool:
  1. Follow our Twitter account ( @turbovax ) to be instantly notified when new appointments open up.
  2. Stay on this page and refresh often. Appointments are will be published to this page in real-time.
); }
